article_title: Yet Another Business Coalition Forms To Tame Health Costs

article_metadata.description: A new coalition of 20 large employers said they have formed a new business coalition known as the “Health Transformation Alliance” in effort to reign in the rising cost of healthcare. While the Wall Street Journal breathlessly described it as a move that could “ripple through the world of employer-provided health [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
